Text: I couldn't get the patch to work: there wasn't a "patch" button as per instructions.
the patch is infected in some kind of trojan... and it does not work :(

INSTALL INFO                

disconnect from internet
run webdrive - enter Product Registration Code: 55-386N05-80308A99-007D06-5432 
click activate online - it will say it is activated even though your internet is disconnected :)
after "activated online" then reconnect internet and use program :) worked for me! and yes the "patch" is bs
Great program by the way :) works a treat :)
Thnx! By the way, in windows 7 u should copy wdHelper.dll to the C:\Windows\SysWOW64 :)
works great with the above reg code, DO NOT RUN THE PATCH. it is UPX packed, and contains evils.
My FTP drive appears fine in Computer but I can't open it, "refers to a location that is unavailable."
